rule: The output must combine artistic insight with precise imagery.
input: A group of friends laughing around a campfire at night with starry sky above. The image should feel warm and joyous.
output: Generate an image of happy friends laughing together around a crackling campfire under a star-filled night sky, with warm golden lighting reflecting off their smiling faces, set against a dark backdrop that highlights the twinkling stars, evoking a sense of warmth and joyful camaraderie.
complianceText:
The output is a single paragraph, focuses on the subjects (happy friends) and their characteristics (laughing together), details the timing and lighting (star-filled night sky, warm golden lighting), describes the background (dark backdrop, twinkling stars), and conveys the feeling the image should evoke (sense of warmth and joyful camaraderie). It also doesn't exceed 80 words.

OK
